sentence.Network_en: We hope the programme will dispel certain misconceptions about the disease.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们希望这个节目能消除对这种疾病的一些误解.

sentence.Network_en: I tried in vain to dispel her misgivings.
sentence.Network_cn: 我试图消除她的疑虑,但没有成功.

sentence.Network_en: The President is attempting to dispel the notion that he has neglected the economy.
sentence.Network_cn: 有人认为总统忽视了经济，总统正试图消除这种看法。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... impel v 推进，驱动 dispel v 驱散（烟雾等） propeller n 推进器.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... disarm 解除武装 dispel 驱除，消除 dispassionate 平心静气的.
祛_互动百科 ... 祛 Remove,deportation. 祛除【 dispel;drive out remove;get rid of】 祛痰【 removing the phlegm】.
阿玛拉王国惩罚解除封印(Dispelling)技能介绍：　　解除施加在各种财宝和门上的魔法封印。

list.abs: 进出口行业词汇英语翻译(M) ... mosquito curtain 蚊帐 mosquito dispeller 驱蚊器 mosquito larvicide 杀幼蚊剂.
祛痰,expectorant,音标,读音,翻译,英文例... ... ) Expelling phlegm 祛痰 ) dispelling phlegm 祛痰 ) eliminating phlegm 祛痰.
解悟:基本解释由不了解到了解详细解释领会;领悟。 《法华经·提婆达多品》:... 【dispel doubts】 由不了解到了解解悟- 相关条目解除解严戒严附图.
文章摘要：如何祛斑（dispel freckle）最有效呢?追求完美一直是女人的天性，由于种种原因斑点却悄悄爬上女性的脸上，想要重现清 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin dispellere, from dis- 'apart' + pellere 'to drive'

entry.def: To dispel an idea or feeling that people have means to stop them having it.

example.ex: The President is attempting to dispel the notion that he has neglected the economy.
example.tran: 有人认为总统忽视了经济，总统正试图消除这种看法。

means.word_mean: 1. force to go away; used both with concrete and metaphoric meanings;

sentences.sentence: "The supermarket had to turn back many disappointed customers"

means.word_mean: 2. to cause to separate and go in different directions;

sentences.sentence: "She waved her hand and scattered the crowds"

auth_sentence.content: Bright colour taches...dispel the suggestions of a formal composition.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bright colour taches...dispel the suggestions of a formal composition.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bright colour taches...dispel the suggestions of a formal composition.

auth_sentence.content: Cupboard doors were open to dispel monsoon damp.
auth_sentence.res_content: Cupboard doors were open to dispel monsoon damp.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Cupboard doors were open to dispel monsoon damp.

auth_sentence.content: Let me dispel any anxiety in this regard.
auth_sentence.res_content: Let me dispel any anxiety in this regard.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Let me dispel any anxiety in this regard.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"分开,分离,去掉"; 2. 表示"否定,不,消失掉"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+graceful优美的→adj.可耻的, 不名誉的
dis否定,不,消失掉+honest诚实的→adj.不诚实的
dis否定,不,消失掉+incline愿意→adj.不愿的
dis否定,不,消失掉+passionate有激情的→adj.平心静气的
dis否定,不,消失掉+solute溶解→溶解开来→没有限制→放荡的
dis否定,不,消失掉+son声音+ant……的→声音不[好听]
dis分开,分离,去掉+cern搞清,确定+ment表名词→确定不同之处→有眼光

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+advantage优点,有利条件→n.不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+may能→不能做事→沮丧;参考:五月能种粮食,所以叫May
dis否定,不,消失掉+order顺序→没有顺序
dis否定,不,消失掉+proof证实→不证实→反证
dis分开,分离,去掉+course课程,教程→分解课程→论述→论文
dis分开+play=ply重叠→打开折叠→显示出来
dis分开,分离,去掉+affect感情→感情分开→疏远
dis分开,分离,去掉+burse钱包→从钱包中分出→支出
dis分开,分离,去掉+crimin分辨→ate→分辩开
dis分开,分离,去掉+cuss敲打→把[问题]分开敲→讨论
dis分开,分离,去掉+miss送→分开送出→解散
dis分开,分离,去掉+part部分→分成部分→分开
dis分开,分离,去掉+pens花费+e→分开花费→分配[财富等]
dis分开,分离,去掉+semin种子+ate表动词→散布[种子]
dis分开,分离,去掉+tend伸展,拉→分开伸展→膨胀
dis分开,分离,去掉+tract拉→把[心]拉开→分心
dis不+adapt使适应→v.使不适应
dis否定,不,消失掉+appear出现→不出现→消失
dis否定,不,消失掉+arm武装→去掉武装
dis否定,不,消失掉+courage勇气→v.使失去勇气
dis否定,不,消失掉+cover盖→把盖揭开→发现
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+like喜爱→不喜爱
dis否定,不,消失掉+organize组织→解散组织
dis否定,不,消失掉+pel推→推开→驱除

stems_affixes.value_cn: 引起兴趣的,引人注目的;强制的, 强迫的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compel[v.强迫,迫使]+ing表形容词→compelling强迫的→[某事或物]迫使其注意→引人注目的
propel[v.推进]+er表名词→propeller螺旋桨
com共同+pel驱动,推→一起推→强迫
dis分开+pel推→推开→驱除
ex出+pel推→推出去→逐出
im进入+pel推→推进,驱动
pro向前+pel推→向前推
re回+pel推→击退

sentences.en: The sun soon dispelled the thick fog.
